items.sentence: Tom sat on the side of his bed and pulled on his socks.
Tom saw a vase of flowers on the table near the window.
You don\'t plan on staying in Boston very long, do you?
You ought to tell Tom that you\'re planning to do that.
You ought to tell Tom you aren\'t planning on swimming.
Tom pushed his dog into the closet and closed the door.
Tom put his stepladder in the back of his pickup truck.
Tom read the note from Mary and then handed it to John.
No one ever knew the true story except the three of us.
No one has the right to tell you how to live your life.
